this is the police offers a technically competent simulation of moral decay where the real monster isnt the criminals or corrupt officials but the system that makes corruption feel like rational selfpreservation the game succeeds precisely where it should disturbby making you complicit in your characters compromise while feeling you had no choice its greatest achievement and failure are identical turning ethical collapse into entertainment

i played this is the police off an on over the course of a couple years and it has consistently kept me captivated this game is a slow burn with a story that takes place in a world that feels real you never see what the city of freeburg actually looks like rather you learn through comic book style illustrations and well written dialogue their are no good guys nor bad guys in this is the police only deeply flawed people attempting to gain power over a city
